My team members have looked into the source of js.jar and it does have the method initStandardObjects in ScriptableObject.class in js.jar. But anyhow it does not picks that method.

I would really appreciate your help.

Nikul Suthar

Weblogic contains an old version JS.jar, so in the weblogic.xml in the WEB-INF, we need add:

<weblogic-web-app>
	<container-descriptor>
		<prefer-web-inf-classes>true</prefer-web-inf-classes>
	</container-descriptor>
</weblogic-web-app>
